actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 in the exclusion from gross income of sick pay.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the limitations made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 on the exclusion for sick pay.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 in the exclusion from gross income of sick pay.
